value.title: Power BI Shows Incorrect Measure Total? How to fix it?

value.title: Power BI Apps and App Workspaces: How to distribute Power BI content to a Large Audience
value.excerpt: Power BI Apps are a terrific way to distribute your Power BI content to a large audience.  You can "Publish App" to Entire Organization or specific individuals and groups. value.title: Power BI Pivot: Move Data from Rows to Columns #Q&A
